thread.title: Paul Munday

author: Paul Munday
title: Paul Munday
text:
We looked on a Whim last Saturday afternoon for a personalised plate for my Wife's new car.. We found the exact one to suit and and it was her name !! I bought it there and then and i must say it was great value ..The plates where delivered on Tuesday and all paperwork was completed by the Thursday, Plates fitted on the Car on Friday.... Happy Wife...
I have used RegTransfers before, the service then was good, but this was unbelievable .. Great work to everyone involved..
